1121.content:
'Alright, here goes nothing.' GardÃ¨voir says. You begin to hover in mid-air as GardÃ¨voir focuses all her psychic powers on you. You feel all tingly inside but nothing else seems to be happening. You suddenly drop back into GardÃ¨voir's hand and you see a bead of sweat running down her face. 'Sorry, I just can't do it' she says,
         "That's okay, you did your best." You respond politely.
         'Thanks, I promise though that I will protect you until we can figure out how to make you full sized again.' she responds. 'By the way, my name's Grace.' she says
         "My name's Blaze, pleased to meet you." You respond.
1121.title: A Failed Attempt and a New Protector.

choices: Stay with your point of view
11211.content:
As Grace began walking toward her cave the two of you continued to talk with each other. You talk about many different things like how you were raised, where you grew up, and just some idle chit-chat. While you are talking Grace doesn't pay attention to where she's stepping and trips. You go flying into the air and land on something soft and wet. Before you can react you're thrown backwards and fall down a long tube. You then land in a large pink chamber filled with green slime.
         "Oh crud." You say as you realize where you are, you've been accidentally eaten by your new friend. The acids don't seem to be affecting you though, "Must be a side-effect of GardÃ¨voir's psychic powers." You say to yourself. As you look around the pulsing chamber.

"Well, are you ready?"

"Don't worry, it won't hurt! And besides, you are full health and this is just a normal Pokéball, so if it's uncomfortable, you should be able to break free, easily!"
"Just let me out again, as soon as you catch me, ok!"
"I'm gonna do that."
"Well press the button then!"
And like she said, you press the button, and like in the anime the red light appears and engulfs Glaze whole, sucking it in the Pokéball!
"Now I just have to wait three seconds."
3, 2, 1 *Ding!*
"It worked, now I just have to press the button again, so Glaze is released."
You press the button again and Glaze comes out.
"i'm back, you hold your promise!"
Well, why would I break it? I mean, you also safed my life, in the time where I could just end up under anyone's foot or in anyone's stomach! INCLUSIVE yours!"
"Yeah, I guess that's right. Come now, it's gonna be a long night so what do you want to do?"

After a short walk the two get to their 'camp' and start talking over various themes, like how it is to be a Pokémon/Human or how they used to live before they met each other. They talked until it was almost midnight.
*Yawns* "Well Blaze, I think one more question and then we go to sleep, ok? So what do you want to know?"
112132112.title: Questions

1121321121.content:
'It's hard to explain.' Gardevoir said. 'Oh I know. While we were talking you said that pokemon can bring held items into the pokeball with them, right.'
"Yeah" Blaze said. Making Gardevoir smile.
'What if I am holding you when you return me. You are small enough that I might be able to count you as a held item, and bring you with me?, there we can sleep in the pokeball.'
Blaze thought about this. If they do it it might not work, and nothing would change. If it does work then you can see what it is like, but since you would be on the inside of the pokeball with Gardevoir you might be trapped in there with her until another trainer let's you out. On top of that you are a living human, and pokeballs are designed for pokemon only, so if it does work then you might be turned into a pokemon as well. If your luck is bad you might even be a shrunken pokemon. And if it is really bad it might use Gardevoir's gender as a base and turn you into a female pokemon. Or if your luck is really really bad it might do both and turn you into a shrunken female pokemon. Is satisfying your curiosity worth it. Decisions decisions.

1121321122121.content:
[Ok, first off, If you didn't notice: I'm using color codes! Green=Glaze, Red=Blaze, In brackets=Me/All-knowing narrator]

"Well, I wasn't kidding as I said it was a COOL place! It's freezing in here!"
"I mean, it's cold, but it's not THAT cold!"

1121321122121.title: Night-talk

choices: ...of the sound of Glaze getting up in the morning!
11213211221211.content:
"Alright, let's go to my sleeping spot!"
"You mean that moss over there?"
"No, that's the sleeping place of my friend, flammable.
"Is it a torchic?"
"Yup! How do you know?"
"I told you earlier, that in my world this world is a game, right? So, I had a torchic as my starter, and I named it flammable! Did you give it the nickname?
"No, it just told me, that her trainer gave it this nickname! One day he just disappeared in the middle of a fight and it began to rain, so she came here to warm up and we instantly became friends!"
"This is getting weird... If only I could remember what I did, before I was brought to this world. But it's coming back, slowly but steady! I just need to find stuff I remember! Btw, where is flammable?"
"She's not here at the moment. She left to train on some trees and that usually takes some days! But let's go to sleep!"


After sleeping a while Blaze wakes up to the sound...
11213211221211.title: Hugged by a giantess!

112132112212112.content:
(Curved=thinking)
*yawn*
"Good morning, you beautiful being!"
*blushes* "You little Gentleman!"
"I'm just telling the..." *RUMBLE* "An earthquake?!"
"Nope, just my stomach! I haven't had dinner yesterday!"
"Well, are there some berries that we can eat around?"
"Yeah, but I don't feel like walking there and you aren't able to get them! I think I'd have some meat today!"
With those words, Glaze picks up Blaze and holds him over her open mouth.
"WHAT? NO! DON'T DO THIS! PLEASE!"
"I won't hurt him, but that doesn't mean, I can't scare him a little!" "Sorry, but if I'm hungry I just can't control myself."
She then puts Blaze into her mouth and licks all over his body.
"Dude, calm down, I told you so many times, I'M NOT GOING TO HURT YOU! Got me?"
Glaze pulls Blaze out of her mouth.
"Don't. Do. That. Ever. Again."
"Sorry, but I wanted to test if you forgot it again. And you did forget it, surprisingly."
"Just go get the berries, please. We are both hungry, right?"
"Alright, alright, do you want to come with me or explore your new home?"
"I'm going to explore the cave, there aren't any Zubats here, right?"
"No don't worry, there aren't as many Zubats in this world as in the game you talked about!"
Glaze soon left to get some berries, and as soon as Blaze gets up to explore, he heard another Pokémon coming into the cave! It was...
112132112212112.title: "Big" prank!

1121321122121122.content:
[Orange=flammable]
...a giant torchic!
"Finally home, again"
"Uhh, ohh. Flammable! I should better hide, not that she mistakes me for a bug!"
"Little human? Are you here? I won't hurt you! If I did, Glaze would probably kill me anyways!"
Blaze, who hid behind a rock walks in front of flammable.
"Here I am, just don't do anything bad to me."
"Don't worry, I talked to Glaze, and her friends are my friends!"
"Well, I guess that's a good thing, considering I'm just as big as your foot."
"Probably! But anyways, I really want to know how this happened to you!"
"I don't really know myself, but I think I was sucked into my game!"
"Game?"
"Oh, I forgot to tell you! I'm coming from a world, where this world is a video game! And the thing is, the starter Pokémon I choose, was a torchic just like you!"
"And?"
"I named it flammable, just like your trainer named you!"
"Ok... that's weird...."
"Yes, I know! Just tell me, how many days passed since your trainer disappeared?"
"It was a week, why?"
"I was here for a week, too!" (He hid for a few days, before he was found by Glaze)
"Ok, so this is getting really strange! That would mean, you were my trainer!"
"I'm back! And I brought some berries!"
"Hi." "Hi." (BTW, If I put two different characters in the same line, they say it the same time, and this is a rime!)
"So, I see you already met! You weren't mistaken for a bug, Blaze."
"Nope, Flammable and me are friends, now!"
"Yes, but didn't you say you got berries, Glaze? I was training two days and didn't eat anything in that time! I would kill for something to eat"
"You won't need to do that. Here take as much as you want! And Blaze, one should be more then enough for you, right?"
"Yes, it's even bigger than me!"
"One giant berry coming right up!"
1121321122121122.title: Your lucky, that she's friendly!

11213211221211221.content:
The spent the day, talking about various things, and slept afterwards, this time Blaze slept with Flammable to keep him warm. The next day...

*Yawn* *Yawn*
"Good morning you two!"
"Good morning..."
"Man, you two REALLY have a sound sleep! You didn't even woke up when I left the cave to get food."
"You already did that? Wow."
"Thank you, I would do it myself, but, A, I can't get them myself and B, even if I could, I don't which are good and which are bad."
"Yeah, there isn't much you can do at one inch."
"But I did some thinking and maybe, some of the stuff, I had around me, gut sucked in this world also!"
"That might be the case, actually! But the question is, do you know where it was?"
"Yes, I do. If one of you could be so nice to hold me, I'll lead the way!"
"Sure, hop on my head."

So the group of three made their way to the place, where place appeared! But when they got there something happend...

"Wait! There is something!"
"It doesn't look like a Pokémon, thou."
"It's a trainer!"
"Holy Arceus! I know who that is! It's Ash Ketchum!" (I CAN add him, since the rules say: "No male POKÉMON")
"Who's that?"
"Oh, only the most known Pokémon trainer in my world!"
"Why?"
"He's in a Pokémon Anime."
"Look Pikachu there's something in that bush! Maybe it's a wild Pokémon!"
"Uhh, ohh!"
"Go, Pikachu!"
"Pikaaa, Pikaaa!"
"Wait, Ash!"
"What you can talk?"
"She's a psychic type, after all!"
"But your not!"
"But Glaze gave her the power to speak!"
"Who is Glaze? And, are you a tiny Human?" *faints*
"Pikaa? PIKAA!"
"What does he say?"
"Wait, I'm giving you the power to understand ALL Pokémon."
"What did you do to Ash?"
"We did nothing, that was just the shock! We should bring him to our cave, so he won't get sick in the cold!"
"I'm coming with you!"

Glaze then uses her psychic abilities to lift Ash in the air and the group makes their way back to the cave! When Ash woke up, he was...
11213211221211221.title: A wild trainer appeares!

112132112212112212.content:
10 minutes later (Just think someone said that with the Spongebob narrator voice.)

"So, here you go, Ash."
"You know, he can't hear or understand you, right?"
"Yes, but I can't help myself! I'm just too kind to not say it!"
"Yeah, you are the kindest being, I've ever seen!"
"That might be, but I'm still not trusting you! I'm gonna protect Ash, no matter what!" *Sits down on the body of Ash, having an aggressive look on her face* (Pikachu has to be female, 'cause rules!)
"We have to talk about our next steps, anyways!"
"Yes, we do! See you later Pikachu!"

Outside the cave

"So, first question is: What will we do with Ash?"
"Well, we most certainly CAN'T let him tell anyone about us!"
"Well, we know that Glaze can shrink humans..."
"WHAT?! Are you insane?"
"Yes, why do you want him to shrink?!"
"BECAUSE YOU HUMANS DESERVE TO BE BUGS!"
Suddenly, flammable starts running towards Blaze, trying to crush him under her feet! When suddenly...
"NO, I WON'T LET YOU DO THAT!"
...flammable was lifted up in the air by Glazes psychic powers!
"LET ME DOWN! I'LL SHOW THIS PESKY BUG WHAT I THINK OF HUMANS!"
"Why?"
"Umm, Glaze, could you use a weak attack against flammable?"
"Why would I do that?"
"YES! WHY WOULD SHE DO THAT YOU WORTHLESS BEING?"
"Because I don't think, that's the flammable you call a 'friend'"
"What are you talking about? She's 100% it!"
"Trust me! Just use your weakest attack on her!"
As soon, as Glaze uses the attack, smoke engulfs flammable.
"What the?!"
"Just as I thought!"
"Grrrr"
"A-a Zorua?"
"Grrrr, yes I'm a Zorua and my name is 'Zelda'"
"But why did you try to kill me?"
"BECAUSE YOU HUMANS CAPTURED MY MOMMY!"
"And where is Flammable?"
"Sleeping in her usual training spot."
"What should we do with her, Glaze?"
"I'll let you down, if you promise not to hurt Blaze!"
"I promise!"
"So, if you know where they brought your mom, we might be able to help you get her back!"
"Really?" "Really?"
"Yeah, sure! I mean, we first need to get flammable, but after that, we don't have anything else to do, really. And we might be able to convince Ash!"
"I think, that my mommy...
"
112132112212112212.title: But before...

choices: A scientist sees them and alerts the others
1121321122121122121.content:
"... Was brought to a lab!" Zelda exclaims "Really? And do you know what are they going to do to her?" Blaze says "Yeah, they said something about experimenting on her abilty!" "Then there's not time to lose! We have to break in that lab and free Zelda's mother!" Glaze says "No, Glaze, we actually need a plan. Now, Zelda, do you know how that lab is?" Blaze asks "Yes, I followed the humans that captured my mommy! It's actually a camp lab" Zelda says "Then we need a strategy" Blaze says. He thinks for a few minutes "Okay, Here's my plan" he says.
*10 minutes later*
"Okay, do you all got it?" Blaze asks "Yeah, but we need Pikachu's help" Glaze says "Then we just have to convince her" Zelda says. The three enter the cave "Uhhh... Pikachu?" Blaze asks. Pikachu was still on Ash's body "Yes?" she says "We need your help" Glaze says "Why would I help you?" Pikachu says "Because I know you and you're one of the kindest pokemon I know" Blaze says. At this Pikachu sighs " You're right. Come on, what do I have to do?" she then asks. The three explain the whole story to her "So you are saying that they captured this Zorua's mother and you want me to help you breaking in a lab and get her out?" Pikachu asks "It's crazy. But hey, compared to all the things I did since now, it looks normal like breathing!" Pikachu says chuckling "Anyway, I'm in" she adds "Well then. How far is this lab, Zelda?" Blaze asks "Well... It's a bit far. We can get there in two days" Zelda says "Two days?! We don't have so much time! Is there a shorter way?" Blaze asks "Well, we could teleport" Glaze says "Wait what?" Blaze asks again "Yeah, you forget I know teleport" "Good idea Glaze!" Zelda says "We'll free Zoroark soon then" Pikachu asks "Oh, her name is Shadia, by the way" Zelda says "But Ash will surely wake up while we're there. What do we do if he runs in search of Pikachu?" Blaze asks "You have a point there" Pikachus says. Glaze thinks for a few moments "Well then" she says. She walks to Ash and her eyes glow cerulean. Then the light stops "What did you do to him?" Pikachu asks suspiciously "I used hypnosis. So he'll sleep longer" Glaze says "Then let's go!" Zelda says. Glaze grabs Blaze, while Zelda and Pikachu get closer to her. Suddendly, they disappear in a flash of pinkish- white light, leaving Ash sleeping alone. They appear in a camp that seems to be the lab, because of all the machines "Here we are!" Zelda says as...
1121321122121122121.title: ...was brought to a lab!"
